text: Kot Lalloo railway station (, ) is located in Kot Lalloo village, Khairpur District of Sindh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways * Kot lalu ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Khairpur District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Kot Lalloo railway station
